es of CHO in Care during Pregnancy:
1. Clinical Functions
 ∙ Facilitate, undertake, and monitor early registration (first trimester) of pregnancy within 12 weeks.
 ∙ Ensure minimal 4 ANC assessment for all pregnant mothers and identify high-risk pregnancies or those with 
complications. These could be done by MPWs as outreach sessions or by you at HWCs. However, you should 
undertake the ANC assessment of all pregnant women in your service area especially in the last trimester of 
pregnancy.
